title: How many NaNoWriMo novels actually get completed each year? - Quora

response.answer_text: In 2008, there were 21683 winners.In 2009, there were 32178 winners.In 20010, there were 37479 winners of 116730 participants with a non-zero word count.In 20011, there were 36843 winners of 126838 participants with a non-zero word count. How many of those were "finished" is unknown, but as you can see, we've had one or two completed novels. :)  You can also see a list of actual, published novels written by NaNoWriMo authors right here: http://www.nanowrimo.org/publishedwrimos/
